column5: I've been on this board for over a year but never introduced myself so here goes.  Name is Dave and do most of my fishing in the spring and fall or migratory river fish.  Recently purchased a fishing kayak and i'm loving taking it out, even on the bigger lakes, although success has been limited.   Also tried out ice fishing last year for the first time and I can't wait for the hard water season to begin.  I'll be out on sturgeon this weekend by verulum park.  If you see a big red kayak, that's probably me!
Hi Dave ... lots of good info and fish stories to be had here agree ... once the ice fishing bug has bit ya its in your blood
Hi Dave!,the ice fishing bug is brutal lol.
Dammit! I wanted that name but took grief for it on here and had to change it. Hello super dave from the other guy who wanted to be superdave.
Welcome and hope you can make it up for a hook up for perch in the up coming weeks Dave. Offer is still open.
Hey Brian.  Let me know when and I'll try to make it. I have an obsession with simcoe for some reason even though she keeps slapping me in the face.
